metadata.dc:title: A new case of primary angiosarcoma of the breast
metadata.dc:creator: Suárez, M. N
Parach , J
Fernández-Robayna, F
metadata.dc:description: We present a new case of primary angiosarcoma of the breast, the second in our department in 12 years, in a 45 year old patient who was diagnosed following wide local excision, a simple mastectomy being carried out later as the tumour was multifocal. A literature review is carried out on this infrequently foundtype of mammary sarcoma, especially as a primary tumour as was our case (AU)
metadata.dc:source: Clín. investig. ginecol. obstet. (Ed. impr.);29(7): 280-282, ago. 2002.
metadata.dc:title: Un nuevo caso de angiosarcoma primario de mama
